Title: Allows a county clerk to employ an attorney-at-law to defend against certain civil actions; and relates to the removal of public officers by the governor
Summary: Allows a county clerk to employ an attorney-at-law to defend against certain civil actions; and relates to the removal of public officers by the governor.
LawCode: Amd ยง409, County L; amd ยง34, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the county law, in relation to allowing a county clerk to employ an attorney-at-law to defend against certain civil actions; and to amend the public officers law, in relation to the removal of public officers by the governor
